author: mcombellack
msg: Reduced the sleep times in the test since they did not need to be so long. This reduced the unit test time (on my machine) from 52 seconds to 12 seconds. The whole of the itests project (on my machine) now builds in 1 minute and 17 seconds rather than over 2 minutes
